sect1.title: ASSERT
sect1.para: ASSERT ASSERT ( condition [ , message ] [ , FAIL FAIL ] [ , CONST CONST ])ASSERT( recset, condition [ , message ] [ , FAIL ] [ , CONST ]) ASSERT function

row.entry: The logical expression that should be always be true.
Optional. The error to display in the workunit. If omitted, a message is generated from the approximate location in the code and the condition being checked.
Optional. Specifies an exception is generated, immediately terminating the workunit.
Optional. Specifies the condition is evaluated during code generation.
The set of records for which to check the condition against each record.
A comma-delimited list of ASSERTs of the first form, used to check multiple conditions against each record in the recset.

sect1.para: The ASSERT action evaluates the condition, and if false, posts the message in the workunit. The workunit terminates immediately if the FAIL option is present.

Form one is the scalar form, evaluating the condition once. Form two evaluates the condition once for each record in the recset. Form three is a variant of form two that nests multiple form one ASSERTs so that each condition is checked against each record in the recset.
